contextId.information: The negative words "unreasonable" and "to not" can be stated in positive form. AT: "it seems reasonable to me that if I send a prisoner then I should also state" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
contextId.quote: it seems unreasonable for me to send a prisoner and to not also state

contextId.information: This can be stated in positive form. AT: "I obeyed" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
This can be stated in positive form. AT: "I am sane ... and" or "I am able to think well ... and" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
This can be stated in positive form. AT: "everything about him was as it should be" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]])
